name: Patriot Pass
description: Patriot Pass is a head-to-head fast paced arcade game where players control George Mason University characters in a unique frisbee tournament who have special abilities. Join the tournament as, Gary M. Unger, an ex-frisbee player now turned campus police who is making a comeback in the frisbee scene, Shipstar, a special robot that was accustomed to delivering food for students now modded out to compete in the tournament, Professor D. fan favorite of GMU students and beloved teacher Professor D. is here to remind students who taught them to play frisbee, or as Sarah, a smart student with the skills to build a robot to help her in the competition.
